photobiologySensors
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • User Guide

Sensors responsive to different wavebands

Names of datasets containing the wavelengths and tabulated values spectral emittance for broadband sensors from various suppliers.

uv_sensors

uvc_sensors

uvb_sensors

erythemal_sensors

uva_sensors

par_sensors

vis_sensors

photometric_sensors

shortwave_sensors

pyranometer_sensors

red_sensors

far_red_sensors

blue_sensors

multichannel_sensors

Format

A vector of character strings.

See also

sensors.mspct

Examples

uv_sensors
#>  [1] "SG01D_C"            "SG01D_B"            "SM60"              
#>  [4] "SKU430a"            "UVS_B"              "SG01D_A"           
#>  [7] "SKU421"             "SKU421a"            "UVS_A"             
#> [10] "UVS_E"              "E1c"                "SKU440a"           
#> [13] "SL_501_high_UVA"    "SL_501_low_UVA"     "SL_501_typical"    
#> [16] "BW_20"              "Berger_UV_Biometer" "SG01L"             
#> [19] "CUV_5"             
uvc_sensors
#> [1] "SG01D_C"
uvb_sensors
#> [1] "SG01D_B" "SM60"    "SKU430a" "UVS_B"  
uva_sensors
#> [1] "SG01D_A" "SKU421"  "SKU421a" "UVS_A"  
par_sensors
#> [1] "SKP215" "SKE510" "SKP210" "PQS1"   "LI_190" "BF5"   
vis_sensors
#> [1] "SKL310" "LI_210"
shortwave_sensors
#> [1] "SKS1110" "LI_200" 
red_sensors
#> [1] "SKR110_R"
far_red_sensors
#> [1] "SKR110_FR"
blue_sensors
#> [1] "TOCON_blue4"
multichannel_sensors
#> [1] "SKR110_R"  "SKR110_FR"

# select PAR sensors
sensors.mspct[par_sensors]
